titles.title: Terrorism Survivors Student Loan Deferment Act
A bill to amend the Higher Education Act of 1965 to provide student loan deferment for victims of terrorist attacks.
Terrorism Survivors Student Loan Deferment Act

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions.

committee.name: Senate Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions

bill.summary:
Terrorism Survivors Student Loan Deferment Act
This bill amends title IV (Student Assistance) of the Higher Education Act of 1965 to allow a borrower who is a victim of a terrorist attack to defer (i.e., suspend repayments on) student loans made under the Federal Family Education Loan, Federal Direct Loan, and Federal Perkins Loan programs.
